synopsis.text: Differ Ariake Arena in Tokyo echoed with excitement as the cast of 'Futsuu no Joshikousei ga [Locodol] Yatte Mita.' revealed a new OVA for their beloved idol series. The announcement, made at the 2nd Early Summer Nagarekawa Festival, follows the success of last year's television anime and promises a thrilling sequel. The story revolves around Nanako, a typical high school girl, who finds herself thrust into the world of local idols alongside her upperclassman, Yukari. As the Nagarekawa Girls, they perform at malls, appear on local TV, and even hold live events on department store rooftops, all while being sponsored by their town. The new OVA will continue their journey, featuring a Christmas special and an episode where they attempt to create a PV. Fans of the series can look forward to more heartwarming adventures with their favorite local idols.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
